players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I think we should focus on gathering information before rushing to vote. We need to watch how everyone behaves and who tries to steer the conversation."
You: "I have information that can help us: Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
You: "I urge everyone to vote for Diana now. Delaying will only give her more chances to manipulate us or eliminate a town member tonight."
Diana: "I find Alice's accusations suspiciously quick and aggressive. Why would she reveal such information so early without any proof? Maybe she's trying to divert attention."
